synthlab.internal
Class Audio

java.lang.Object
  synthlab.internal.Audio

public class Audio
extends java.lang.Object

This is a singleton responsible of allocating and storing an audio data line of the correct format used by the library.

Field Summary
private static javax.sound.sampled.AudioFormat format_
          The default format of the audio data line
private static javax.sound.sampled.SourceDataLine line_
          The default data line singleton instance
 
Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static void closeLine()
          This will close the default audio data line.
static javax.sound.sampled.SourceDataLine getLine()
          This will return an audio data line singleton using the appropriate format.
static void openLine()
          This will open the default audio data line for writing.
static void startLine()
          This will start playing the audio buffer written in the default data line.
static void stopLine()
          This will stop playing the audio buffer written in the default data line.
